page.title: 19SPORTS AND HOBBIES.
page.content: Most of the summer sports in this block are related to natural out door activies i.e. angling, hill-walking, sailing,cycling. There are very few team sports played as there are no facilities in the area and even the children do not play at football or cricket etc. as there is very little flat land around. There is one private tennis court and the new owners have encouraged local people to use it this year and this has proved popular. Every house has a garden and gardening is a popular past-time in spite of the notorious "Midgies". The community hall is the main venue for sport in the winter. Badminton and indoor bowls are both played there and there is a local darts club in the local pub. Friendly matches are also played away from home.
